channel.title: Ps3, XBox 360, or Wii [ Your Pick ]
channel.description:
I hate when people say “ O this console sucks get this one its pwnage”, but nobody gives informal information about each one. I preferably have and wanted a Sony Playstation 3, I think it works best for me because I have a Sony Psp but people have different opinions. What bugs me the most is people say that the Microsoft’s X Box 360 is better and blah blah blah…. Ect.. but every system has its own flaw and its not fair when you compare a system that’s been out longer than other systems the X Box 360 didn’t have many games when it first came out sooo do not compare an older system to a newer one and “WTF” are they trying to prove… , yet I ask you the Moparscape community what do you think about each console. Sony’s Playstation 3, Microsoft’s X Box 360, and the Nintendo Wii. Please do nto give stupid comments like “ ooo you’re a Sony Fan boy, or Nintendo Fan boy…that proves nothing at all and please give some educational proof about what ever system your talking about.
Ps: If you want say why you like that console :]] and Comment :]]]
Only Next Gen Consoles
Many Thanks

item.description:
@cooper wrote:

PS3 is amazing. I recently got it as a present, and I must admit, Sony [with the psp/ps3] and Nintendo [with the ds/wii] have really done amazing jobs. I’m almost as happy with them as I was the dreamcast… then again, SEGA is still better and always will be :).

item.title: Ps3, XBox 360, or Wii [ Your Pick ]
item.dc:creator: @wasabiie wasabiie
item.description:
@wasabiie wrote:

They all have there various advantages and flaws, I love the Xbox 360 online while I love the ps3 Graphics, and the Wii is just plain original with all its games and features.

So overall I would think the Xbox 360 would be the best, Because Everything it has falls in the middle and it’s very balanced with it’s games and graphics.
